00019 void calc_alpha(Node *n, double beta) {
00020   n->alpha = 0.0;
00021   for (Path *path = n->lpath; path; path = path->lnext)
00022     n->alpha = logsumexp(n->alpha,
00023                          -beta * path->cost + path->lnode->alpha,
00024                          path == n->lpath);
00025 }
00026 
00027 void calc_beta(Node *n, double beta) {
00028   n->beta = 0.0;
00029   for (Path *path = n->rpath; path; path = path->rnext)
00030     n->beta = logsumexp(n->beta,
00031                         -beta * path->cost + path->rnode->beta,
00032                         path == n->rpath);
00033 }
00034 
00035 bool partial_match(const char *f1, const char *f2) {
00036   char buf1[BUF_SIZE];
00037   char *c1[64];
00038   char buf2[BUF_SIZE];
00039   char *c2[64];
00040   std::strncpy(buf1, f1, sizeof(buf1));
00041   std::strncpy(buf2, f2, sizeof(buf2));
00042 
00043   size_t n1 = MeCab::tokenizeCSV(buf1, c1, sizeof(c1));
00044   size_t n2 = MeCab::tokenizeCSV(buf2, c2, sizeof(c2));
00045   size_t n  = _min(n1, n2);
00046 
00047   for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00048     if (std::strcmp(c1[i], "*") != 0 &&
00049         std::strcmp(c1[i], c2[i]) != 0) return false;
00050   }
00051   return true;
00052 }
00053 }

00055 Viterbi::Viterbi() : level_(0), theta_(0.0), cost_factor_(0),
00056                      end_node_list_(0), begin_node_list_(0) {}
00057 
00058 Viterbi::~Viterbi() { close(); }
00059 
00060 bool Viterbi::open(const Param &param, Tokenizer *t, Connector *c) {
00061   tokenizer_ = t;
00062   connector_ = c;
00063 
00064   begin_node_list_.reserve(MIN_INPUT_BUFFER_SIZE);
00065   end_node_list_.reserve(MIN_INPUT_BUFFER_SIZE);
00066   path_freelist_.reset(0);
00067 
00068   copy_sentence_ = param.get<bool>("allocate-sentence");
00069   cost_factor_ = param.get<int>("cost-factor");
00070   CHECK_FALSE(cost_factor_ > 0) << "cost-factor is empty";
00071 
00072   set_theta(param.get<double>("theta"));
00073   set_lattice_level(param.get<int>("lattice-level"));
00074   set_partial(param.get<bool>("partial"));
00075   set_all_morphs(param.get<bool>("all-morphs"));
00076 
00077   return true;
00078 }

00080 void Viterbi::close() {}
00081 
00082 void Viterbi::set_lattice_level(int level) {
00083   level_ = level;
00084   connect_ = &Viterbi::connectNormal;
00085   analyze_ = &Viterbi::viterbi;
00086   if (level_ >= 1) {
00087     if (!path_freelist_.get()) {
00088       path_freelist_.reset(new FreeList<Path>(PATH_FREELIST_SIZE));
00089     }
00090     connect_ = &Viterbi::connectWithAllPath;
00091   }
00092   if (level_ >= 2) {
00093     analyze_ = &Viterbi::forwardbackward;
00094   }
00095 }
00096 
00097 bool Viterbi::all_morphs() const {
00098   return (buildLattice_ == &Viterbi::buildAllLattice);
00099 }
00100 
00101 void Viterbi::set_all_morphs(bool all_morphs) {
00102   buildLattice_ = all_morphs ?
00103       &Viterbi::buildAllLattice :
00104       &Viterbi::buildBestLattice;
00105 }
00106 
00107 Node *Viterbi::analyze(const char *str, size_t len) {
00108   if (!partial_ && copy_sentence_) {
00109     sentence_.resize(len + 1);
00110     std::strncpy(&sentence_[0], str, len);
00111     str = &sentence_[0];
00112   }
00113 
00114   end_node_list_.resize(len + 4);
00115   begin_node_list_.resize(len + 4);
00116 
00117   std::memset(&end_node_list_[0],   0,
00118               sizeof(end_node_list_[0]) * (len + 4));
00119   std::memset(&begin_node_list_[0], 0,
00120               sizeof(begin_node_list_[0]) *(len + 4));
00121 
00122   clear();
00123 
00124   if (partial_ && !initConstraints(&str, &len))
00125     return 0;
00126 
00127   if (!(this->*analyze_)(str, len))
00128     return 0;
00129 
00130   return(this->*buildLattice_)();
00131 }
00132 
00133 void Viterbi::clear() {
00134   tokenizer_->clear();
00135   Z_ = 0.0;
00136   if (path_freelist_.get()) path_freelist_->free();
00137 }

00139 bool Viterbi::forwardbackward(const char *sentence, size_t len) {
00140   if (!this->viterbi(sentence, len)) return false;
00141 
00142   end_node_list_[0]->alpha = 0.0;
00143   for (int pos = 0;   pos <= static_cast<long>(len);  ++pos)
00144     for (Node *node = begin_node_list_[pos]; node; node = node->bnext)
00145       calc_alpha(node, theta_);
00146 
00147   begin_node_list_[len]->beta = 0.0;
00148   for (int pos = static_cast<long>(len); pos >= 0;    --pos)
00149     for (Node *node = end_node_list_[pos]; node; node = node->enext)
00150       calc_beta(node, theta_);
00151 
00152   Z_ = begin_node_list_[len]->alpha;  // alpha of EOS
00153 
00154   for (int pos = 0;   pos <= static_cast<long>(len);  ++pos)
00155     for (Node *node = begin_node_list_[pos]; node; node = node->bnext)
00156       node->prob = std::exp(node->alpha + node->beta - Z_);
00157 
00158   return true;
00159 }
00160 
00161 bool Viterbi::viterbi(const char *sentence, size_t len) {
00162   bosNode_ = tokenizer_->getBOSNode();
00163   bosNode_->begin_node_list = &begin_node_list_[0];
00164   bosNode_->end_node_list = &end_node_list_[0];
00165   bosNode_->sentence_length = len;
00166 
00167   begin_ = sentence;
00168   end_   = begin_ + len;
00169   bosNode_->surface = begin_;
00170   end_node_list_[0] = bosNode_;
00171 
00172   for (size_t pos = 0; pos < len; ++pos) {
00173     if (end_node_list_[pos]) {
00174       Node * rNode = tokenizer_->lookup(begin_ + pos, end_);
00175       rNode = filterNode(rNode, pos);
00176       begin_node_list_[pos] = rNode;
00177       if (!connect(pos, rNode)) return false;
00178     }
00179   }
00180 
00181   eosNode_ = tokenizer_->getEOSNode();
00182   eosNode_->surface = end_;
00183   begin_node_list_[len] = eosNode_;
00184   for (long pos = len; static_cast<long>(pos) >= 0; --pos) {
00185     if (end_node_list_[pos]) {
00186       if (!connect(pos, eosNode_)) return 0;
00187       break;
00188     }
00189   }
00190 
00191   return true;
00192 }
00193 
00194 Node *Viterbi::buildAllLattice() {
00195   if (!buildBestLattice()) return 0;
00196 
00197   Node *prev = bosNode_;
00198   const size_t len = static_cast<size_t>(end_ - begin_);
00199 
00200   for (long pos = 0; pos <= static_cast<long>(len); ++pos) {
00201     for (Node *node = begin_node_list_[pos]; node; node = node->bnext) {
00202       prev->next = node;
00203       node->prev = prev;
00204       prev = node;
00205       for (Path *path = node->lpath; path; path = path->lnext)
00206         path->prob = std::exp(path->lnode->alpha
00207                               - theta_ * path->cost
00208                               + path->rnode->beta - Z_);
00209     }
00210   }
00211 
00212   return bosNode_;
00213 }
00214 
00215 Node *Viterbi::buildBestLattice() {
00216   Node *node = eosNode_;
00217   for (Node *prevNode; node->prev;) {
00218     node->isbest = 1;
00219     prevNode = node->prev;
00220     prevNode->next = node;
00221     node = prevNode;
00222   }
00223 
00224   return bosNode_;
00225 }
00226 
00227 bool Viterbi::initConstraints(const char **sentence,
00228                               size_t *len) {
00229   constraint_buf_.resize(*len + 1);
00230   char *str = &constraint_buf_[0];
00231   std::strncpy(str, *sentence, *len);
00232 
00233   std::vector<char *> lines;
00234   const size_t lsize = tokenize(str, "\n", std::back_inserter(lines), 0xffff);
00235   CHECK_FALSE(0xffff != lsize) << "too long lines";
00236 
00237   char* column[2];
00238   size_t pos = 1;
00239 
00240   sentence_.resize(*len + 1);
00241   StringBuffer os(&sentence_[0], *len + 1);
00242   os << ' ';
00243 
00244   for (size_t i = 0; i < lsize; ++i) {
00245     const size_t size = tokenize(lines[i], "\t", column, 2);
00246     if (size == 1 && std::strcmp(column[0], "EOS") == 0) break;
00247     os << column[0] << ' ';
00248     const size_t len = std::strlen(column[0]);
00249     if (size == 2) {
00250       CHECK_FALSE(*column[1] != '\0') << "use \\t as separator";
00251       Node *c = tokenizer_->getNewNode();
00252       c->surface = column[0];
00253       c->feature = column[1];
00254       c->length  = len;
00255       c->rlength = len + 1;
00256       c->bnext = 0;
00257       c->wcost = 0;
00258       begin_node_list_[pos - 1] = c;
00259     }
00260     pos += len + 1;
00261   }
00262 
00263   os << '\0';
00264 
00265   *sentence = const_cast<const char*>(os.str());
00266   *len = pos - 1;  // remove the last ' '
00267 
00268   return true;
00269 }
00270 
00271 Node* Viterbi::filterNode(Node *node, size_t pos) {
00272   if (!partial_) return node;
00273 
00274   Node *c = begin_node_list_[pos];
00275   if (!c) return node;
00276 
00277   Node *prev = 0;
00278   Node *result = 0;
00279 
00280   for (Node *n = node; n; n = n->bnext) {
00281     if (c->length == n->length && (std::strcmp(c->feature, "*") == 0 ||
00282                                    partial_match(c->feature, n->feature))) {
00283       if (prev) {
00284         prev->bnext = n;
00285         prev = n;
00286       } else {
00287         result = n;
00288         prev = result;
00289       }
00290     }
00291   }
00292 
00293   if (!result) result = c;
00294   if (prev) prev->bnext = 0;
00295 
00296   return result;
00297 }
